name: From the waste (indefinite hiatus)
description:
This was a project I started in march 2020 and worked on off and on again until may of 2021. I may come back to it one day but that isn't too likely.

The game would have been a 5-10 stage topdown shooter, in its current state the only working level is the first.

CONTROLS: wasd to move, mouse to aim, left click to shoot, right click for hammer, and space to use the super gun.
